title: Dr. Jose Romero answers most common COVID vaccine hesitancy questions
author: Mills Hayes
description: Pulaski County Clerk Terri Holingsworth hosted a question and answer with Dr. Jose Romero, the secretary of the Arkansas Department of Health, for all county courthouse employees Wednesday. With approximately 1,200 employees, the county is not immune to vaccine hesitancy. Julio Gonzales came to the question and answer with questions prepared. He said he previously worked two decades in the medical field before transitioning to work for the county four years ago.
